item.description:
This class consists of topics that focus on practical and deep experiences of the God Self or the Christ within each person. We start with a short meditation followed by a reading and discussion. It is nondenominational so it is open to people of all faiths. It is based on inner knowing, not dogma.

See you then,
Rev Gabrielle
item.how_to_find_us: We're just around the corner from the Stony Brook T-stop on the Orange line.
item.name: Introduction to Christian Mysticism
